articles.title: "We Will Never Merge": Ola CEO Bhavish Aggarwal On Uber Merger Reports - NDTV
articles.description: Ola chief executive Bhavish Aggarwal has denied media reports of merger talks with Uber. Mr Aggarwal tweeted Ola is "very profitable and growing well" and the reports of merger talks with the American ride-hailing firm are "absolute rubbish".
articles.content:
Ola CEO Bhavish Aggarwal denied the firm is in merger talks with Uber

articles.title: Russia now open to discussion on prisoner swap to free Brittney Griner - CBC Sports
articles.description: Russian Foreign Minister Sergey Lavrov said Friday that he's open to a call with U.S. Secretary of State Antony Blinken to discuss a possible prisoner swap involving American basketball star Brittney Griner.

articles.title: Anglo American cuts interim dividend as commodity prices soften - News24
articles.description: Group earnings dropped in line with commodity prices while production also slid amid operational challenges.
articles.content:
Anglo American, one of the world's largest miners, has declared a $1.5 billion (~R25 billion) interim dividend, down from $2.1 billion declared in June last year as commodity prices softened.
